detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our team consists of attorneys with substantial experience in the U.S. court system and international business law. We provide expert legal advice tailored to your business needs.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: We offer a full range of legal and business services, from incorporation and fundraising to regulatory filings and corporate governance. Our goal is to support your business at every stage.

detailsData.title: International Expertise
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are educated and experienced in both the U.S. and Europe, allowing us to provide comprehensive legal support for international business ventures. We understand the complexities of cross-border transactions.

detailsData.title: Trusted by Clients
detailsData.content: We are trusted by a wide range of companies, from startups to well-established enterprises. Our clients operate primarily in the technology, IT, and healthcare sectors, both in the United States and internationally.

valueProp: We provide legal and business advice during the full cycle of a company’s lifetime, from incorporation and fundraising, through ongoing commercial activity, to exits. Our area of expertise includes contract negotiation and drafting, corporate governance, and regulatory filings.
CTA: Start or run a business venture in the U.S.

testimonalData.text: Komorowski PLLC provided exceptional legal support for our startup. Their expertise in U.S. business law was invaluable.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: The team at Komorowski PLLC is knowledgeable and professional. They helped us navigate complex international business regulations.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: We highly recommend Komorowski PLLC for their comprehensive legal services. They were instrumental in our successful fundraising efforts.
testimonalData.author: Michael Johnson
